title: PBE - Can't login to account
body: I just got my PB account approved and downloaded the client. However, it say my username orpassword isincorrect so I changed the password just to make sure. Even after changing the passsword it wont let me in, keeps saying username or password is incorrect.

replies.body: Yea same I can't log in and I changed password twice
Also same here, sent a ticket to the recovery team last night, no response yet. I suppose its just a waiting game now.
Also having this issue, no response yet from account recovery. I would assume that they are bogged down with tickets right now.
Ive tried to change my password and everything, I even tried reinstalling PBE and it still wont work... Help...{{champion:90}}

Hey guys, if you're having PBE recovery issues shoot over an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account team can help you out directly!
